about_the_game:
For video creators and streamers
STP WORKS permits the use of our games for video distribution to YouTube and other sites, and monetization through video distribution platform partner programs.


Game Overview
This is the 3rd in a series of online co-op coin pusher games, "Old Coin Pusher Friends," set in the Edo period. In this installment, there is a Sugoroku (board game) themed around the Tokaido Fifty-Three Stations, with various events triggered by the squares you land on. Work together with other players to defeat yokai, punish corrupt officials, and aim for the jackpot. As you progress in the game, you can enhance your abilities with various upgrades.

Multiplayer
There are two types of multiplayer modes: random matchmaking and friend matchmaking. Whether you want to experience one-time encounters with random players or play with your friends, the game can be played in various styles. You can play with up to four people at once.

Sugoroku
Advance by collecting dice that appear on the board. Various events are triggered depending on the squares you land on.

Co-op Events
There are cooperative mini-games such as defeating yokai, punishing corrupt officials and evil magistrates, and dealing with volcanic eruptions. The strength of the yokai increases according to the players' strength, and the stronger the yokai, the more prizes they drop.

Prize Collection
Collect various Edo-period-themed prizes. The more prizes you collect, the more rewards you receive at reach the goal of the Sugoroku.

Ability Enhancements & Avatars
There are various upgrade features such as Gatling guns, auxiliary launchers, appearance changes for pieces and launchers, attack power upgrades, and increased firing speed.

name: Old Coin Pusher Friends 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In this installment, there is a Sugoroku themed around the old Japan, with various events triggered by the squares you land on. Work together with other players to defeat yokai, and aim for the jackpot. As you progress in the game, you can enhance your abilities with various upgrades.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
